p.span: No school for students Monday, March 16 through Tuesday, April 29, 2020.
For the lastest updates please view our Facebook Page:
An archive of updates can also be found on our web site at Information on Covid-19
To all of our ACS kids and families- we miss you! We wanted to do something to show you we care, and we hope you are all doing well! Can’t wait to see you all again! Much love from all of us at ACS!!
Please see the PDF for the latest updates from the district.
Please contact Ann Remington or Rod Tidd with any questions regarding deliveries at (315) 482-9971.
